(ROOT
  (SBARQ
    (WHADVP (WRB Whenever))
    (SQ
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VB ask)
        (PRT (RP around))
        (PP (IN about)
          (SBAR
            (WHADVP (WRB where))
            (S
              (NP (DT the) (JJS best) (NN carrot) (NN cake))
              (VP (VBZ is)))))
        (, ,)))))


advmod(ask-3, Whenever-1)
nsubj(ask-3, you-2)
root(ROOT-0, ask-3)
prt(ask-3, around-4)
prep(ask-3, about-5)
advmod(is-11, where-6)
det(cake-10, the-7)
amod(cake-10, best-8)
nn(cake-10, carrot-9)
nsubj(is-11, cake-10)
pcomp(about-5, is-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB invariably))
    (NP (NN someone))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB mention)
        (NP (NNP Chey) (NNP Sua))))
    (. .)))


advmod(mention-4, invariably-1)
nsubj(mention-4, someone-2)
aux(mention-4, will-3)
root(ROOT-0, mention-4)
nn(Sua-6, Chey-5)
dobj(mention-4, Sua-6)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN In)
      (NP (NN fact)))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, In-1)
pobj(In-1, fact-2)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN by)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN way) (NNS people) (NN talk))
        (PP (IN about)
          (NP (PRP it)))
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP (PRP$ our) (NN forum)))))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, by-1)
det(talk-5, the-2)
nn(talk-5, way-3)
nn(talk-5, people-4)
pobj(by-1, talk-5)
prep(talk-5, about-6)
pobj(about-6, it-7)
prep(talk-5, in-8)
poss(forum-10, our-9)
pobj(in-8, forum-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT this) (NN stall) (POS 's))
      (NN reputation))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (RB almost) (JJ legendary)))
    (. .)))


det(stall-2, this-1)
poss(reputation-4, stall-2)
possessive(stall-2, 's-3)
nsubj(legendary-7, reputation-4)
cop(legendary-7, is-5)
advmod(legendary-7, almost-6)
root(ROOT-0, legendary-7)
